description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，汉族，中国共产党党员。曾任中共鞍山市委常委、秘书长、鞍山市副市长、鞍山市人大常委会主任，以及第十三届全国人民代表大会辽宁地区代表。
description.en: A Chinese politician, of Han ethnicity, and a member of the Communist Party of China. He has served as a member of the Standing Committee and Secretary-General of the CPC Anshan Municipal Committee, Deputy Mayor of Anshan, Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Anshan People's Congress, and a delegate for the Liaoning region to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国辽宁省鞍山市下辖的县级市。
description.en: A county-level city under the administration of Anshan, Liaoning province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的创立者和执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 东亚的一个民族，是中国的主体民族。
description.en: An East Asian ethnic group and nation, who constitute the world's largest ethnic group.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，由中国共产党执政。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia governed by the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届国家最高权力机关，任期为2018年至2023年。
description.en: The thirteenth term of the highest state body of the People's Republic of China, which convened from 2018 to 2023.

nodes.id: 中国共产党鞍山市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党鞍山市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在鞍山市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Anshan City.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国辽宁省鞍山市的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Anshan City, Liaoning Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 鞍山市人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 鞍山市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 鞍山市人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the Anshan Municipal People's Congress.
Zhang Shichao is from Haicheng, Liaoning.

description.zh-cn: 张世超是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Zhang Shichao is a member of the Communist Party of China.
Zhang Shichao is of Han ethnicity.

relationships.target: 中国共产党鞍山市委员会

description.zh-cn: 2013年7月，张世超任中共鞍山市委常委、秘书长。
description.en: In July 2013, Zhang Shichao was appointed as a member of the Standing Committee and Secretary-General of the CPC Anshan Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2016年3月，张世超任鞍山市副市长，同时继续担任市委常委。
description.en: In March 2016, Zhang Shichao was appointed Deputy Mayor of Anshan, while continuing to serve as a member of the municipal party's standing committee.

relationships.target: 鞍山市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 2018年1月至2019年1月，张世超任鞍山市人大常委会主任。
description.en: From January 2018 to January 2019, Zhang Shichao served as the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Anshan Municipal People's Congress.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2018年2月24日，张世超当选为第十三届全国人民代表大会辽宁地区代表。
description.en: On February 24, 2018, Zhang Shichao was elected as a delegate representing the Liaoning region to the 13th National People's Congress.
